# 68. Install Dart Sass as npm global dependency in preparation of Bootstrap upgrade

**Date:** 2023-01-10

**Optional per env:** _required on all environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
Install Dart Sass as global NPM library. 

## Details
We are preparing to upgrade CommCare HQ to Bootstrap 5. In order to support this upgrade, we need to compile
SCSS files. Dart Sass is the current recommended compiler for this and will need to be installed.

## Steps to update
To install dart sass on your machines, please run:
```bash
cchq <env> deploy-stack --tags=npm
```
